posts.post_content:
Posted By: Patrick McMenemy
Since adding to my PCL has almost come to a standstill, I have decided to add some 1909 and 1910 Obaks to my collection. I'm interested in VG/EX "creaseless examples" of catchers in these sets. Furthermore, I'm still hunting for catchers in the 1912 Zeenut and Home Run Kisses sets as well as the 1911 Obak set. Here's a link to my PCL collection to show you what I currently have already.

[url]http://mysite.verizon.net/vzeqzw1e/thevintagecatcher/[/url]

Thanks in advance,

Patrick
